name: The stairway to eden
description:
THE RULES OF THE GAME:


The game promise you to reach the biblical gardens of eden if you just climb few floors, but you discover that you need to fight energy to survive

The game uses procedural generation to create an infinite balanced experience

Everything, from the voice over to the music, the textures and the code was made by orenong in 1 week

d

The game uses the HDRP pipeline of the UNITY3D engine with costum made shaders to create the ultimate theme


What are you wating for? Try it for yourself and share your highest score in the comments!
